title: Rescaled Quits Rate (DISCONTINUED)
notes:
Monthly updates of the DHI Hiring Indicators have been discontinue by the source.

The Rescaled Quits Rate offers a measure of voluntary job separations. The total number of quits per number of employed workers time series is rescaled to have the same variance and mean as the Vacancies to Unemployment Ratio time series.
